availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: B. W. S. Huffaker (Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Cassander Huffaker. Farmer in Wayne County in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860. Farmer in Wayne County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Division 1, p. 290B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, p. 461.
Find A Grave, "Barton William Stone Huffaker (1825-1898)," Memorial #66273255, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66273255 (accessed June 15, 2020).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Wayne County, KY, October and November 1863, p. 80 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
